description: A puzzle where tiles are moved into an empty space to reach a target configuration.

types.tile: a square tile with a number on it
types.position: a cell in the grid where a tile or empty space can be

at.description: Indicates that a tile is currently at a given position on the board.
at.example: (at t1 p11) means tile 1 is at the top-left corner.

empty.description: Marks a position as currently empty (no tile on it).
empty.example: (empty p33) means the bottom-right corner is empty.

adjacent.description: Defines two positions as neighbors, allowing tiles to slide between them.
adjacent.example: (adjacent p12 p13) means positions p12 and p13 are next to each other.

move.description: Slide a tile into the empty position next to it.

parameters.?from: the position the tile is currently on
parameters.?to: the empty position the tile will move into

effects: The tile ?t is now at position ?to.
The position ?to is no longer empty.
